StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Around 12 years of global experience in the IT industry working for organizations like Goldman Sachs, JP Morgan Chase, Morgan Stanley, eGain in various roles. My key strengths are to understand business with a technology mindset and create a strategy for the technology, identify key focus areas and drive strong execution to deliver the impact. Worked on complete SDLC starting from RFP, Vendor Analysis, planning, PoC, requirement analysis, development, maintenance and support. Expertise in Program Management, Project Management, People Management, requirement analysis, client interaction, global team coordination, design, development, maintenance and support of software applications.

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Harsandeep Singh is a resident of Jersey City, NJ, US. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 15 years. Currently he is employed as a Program Manager at GOLDMAN SACHS INC. Harsandeep has extensive knowledge of Java, Web Services, Enterprise Java Beans, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Java Servlets, Java Server Pages, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, JDBC, Software as a Service, MVC, Java Messaging Service. Harsandeep has an extensive management experience (4 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Currently since 2011 the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Program Manager at GOLDMAN SACHS INC.. Since 2010 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Technical Lead at NYTP.
